item.description:
Our next JavaScript Meetup will be held on Thursday, March 26th at Microsoft Research Center located at One Memorial Drive in Cambridge. You should come to the 11th floor to be let in.

Chris Bowen, the local Microsoft Developer Advisor, will be presenting on the use of JavaScript for IE8.

This topic will take up the entire meeting. Chris will discuss jQuery at a future meeting.

Chris Bowen | Microsoft | 774.249.4804 | http://blogs.msdn.com... |Twitter @ChrisBowen

March Northeast MSDN Roadshow - 5 cities - Azure, F#, SQL Server, Dev Practices, XNA, Debugging - http://tinyurl.com/Ro...

New England Code Camp 11, March 28, Waltham MA - http://tinyurl.com/NE...

Microsoft will provide pizza again. What a nice company!

Please RSVP and bring guests.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be over by the pizza!!
item.name: March JavaScript Meetup
